xmlText.p: First Period_1, Pittsburgh, Sheahan 7 (Oleksiak, Guentzel), 1:41. 2, Pittsburgh, Dumoulin 4 (Malkin, Rust), 6:57. 3, Columbus, Panarin 16 (Atkinson, Dubois), 9:53. 4, Pittsburgh, Sheahan 8 (Guentzel, Oleksiak), 11:29. Penalties_Jarry, PIT, served by Guentzel, (tripping), 18:41.
